name: Free Gifts Widget with Images
author: Yatko

sections.description: Free Gifts is a lightweight widget to display today\’s free gifts and gift cards on your wordpress blog or website. The widget is showing the latest gifteng images, title and description. Gifteng is a unique social community where you can give and receive things you love, for free.
sections.installation:
1. Upload free_gifts directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Activate the Free Gifts Widget and optionally set the border styles
sections.faq: Gifteng is a unique social community where you can give and receive things you love, for free. This widget will display the latest gifts posted today to your visitors trough your blog or website.

short_description: Free gifts and gift cards from gifteng.com
